body:
So, I haven't seen a discussion about this as of yet.

But holy crap this show. I watched all two seasons (albeit 20 episodes) in two days and it's just so unique and brilliant. 

Has anyone else seen it/heard of it? It was just recently announced that production is underway on the third season and I'm really amped for it.

title: Rick and Morty
